data.name: Bird and Blossom Park
data.description: A Mondstadt-style park lined with lush hedgerows and sturdy trees that surround a fountain. A passing breeze is sure to carry the lovely fragrances enjoyed by finches and butterflies.\nIn the eyes of some poets, flowers and birds are a symbol of goodness and nature. As such, bards will sometimes sing by the fountains, which often attracts the attention of passers-by â€” and their various pets, of course.

text.text: Whenever I go for a stroll around Mondstadt and see the citizens happy and free, I feel deeply inspired.
The Knights perform our duty precisely so that the city's residents may live in peace.
The atmosphere in this park is excellent. Thank you...
The wind blowing through this park brings with it a familiar scent.
This would be the perfect spot to rest on a nice afternoon, listening to the sounds of the water... It's just so relaxing.
Thank you! I love this place.
Staying here feels like being in Mondstadt. The only difference is that I won't be bothered by any of my duties as one of the Knights of Favonius.
Imagine bringing a bottle of finely-aged wine here and having a taste... Now, wouldn't that be bliss?
When that time comes, let's chat as we do right now, friend.
Ah... the park is one of the most pleasant places in the city.
Most people taking a break there are relaxed and in pretty good spirits, so they're always willing to listen to a song or two.
Eh-he~ let's work together to make this park even more beautiful!
The sisters working at the church shouldn't be able to find this place, so I can rest without any interruptions.
Thanks for telling me about this place.
